name: system configuration

rules.to: 'System state (' &	'weatherLastDate: ' & $globalContext( 'weatherLastDate' )  & 	', savingsLastDate: ' & $globalContext( 'savingsLastDate' )  & 	', reservoirsClusteringDate: ' & $globalContext( 'reservoirsClusteringDate' )  & 	', productionLastDate: ' & $globalContext( 'productionLastDate' ) & 	', reservoirsClusteringDate: ' & $globalContext( 'reservoirsClusteringDate' )  & 	', savingsLastDate: ' & $globalContext( 'savingsLastDate' ) & 	', productionLastDate: ' & $globalContext( 'productionLastDate' ) & 	', weatherLastDate: ' & $globalContext( 'weatherLastDate' ) & 	', waterLastDate: ' & $globalContext( 'waterLastDate' ) & 	', commonLastDate: ' & $globalContext( 'commonLastDate' ) & 	')'

name: if waiting data
set log message
read globals
func:
msg.payload = {
    weatherLastDate: global.get( 'weatherLastDate' ),
    locations: global.get( 'locations' ),

    savingsLastDate: global.get( 'savingsLastDate' ),
    reservoirs: global.get( 'reservoirs' ),

    productionLastDate: global.get( 'productionLastDate' ),
    factories: global.get( 'factories' ),

    reservoirsClusteringDate: global.get( 'reservoirsClusteringDate' ),
    savingsClusteringDate: global.get('savingsClusteringDate'),
    productionClusteringDate: global.get('productionClusteringDate'),
    weatherClusteringDate: global.get('weatherClusteringDate'),
    waterClusteringDate: global.get('waterClusteringDate'),

    reservoirsClusteringResult: global.get('reservoirsClusteringResult'),
    savingsClusteringResult: global.get('savingsClusteringResult'),
    productionClusteringResult: global.get('productionClusteringResult'),
    weatherClusteringResult: global.get('weatherClusteringResult'),
    waterClusteringResult: global.get('waterClusteringResult'),
}

return msg;

name: clean globals
savings period30 query
func:
const { startPeriod30 } = global.get('dateHelpers');
const date2 = msg.payload;
const date1 = startPeriod30(date2);

const [y1, m1, d1] = date1.split('-');
const [y2, m2, d2] = date2.split('-');

const period = `${d1}/${m1}-${d2}/${m2}`;

const query = y1 === y2
?
`
SELECT 
    '${period}' AS period, 
    SUBSTR(date, 1, 4) AS year,
    count(date) as days, 
    SUM(day_sum) AS period_sum, 
    AVG(day_sum) AS period_avg
FROM
(
    SELECT 
        date, 
        SUM(quantity) AS day_sum, 
        avg(quantity) AS quantity
    FROM savings
    WHERE quantity > 0 
    AND 
    (
        (SUBSTR(date, 6, 2) = '${m1}' AND SUBSTR(date, 9, 2) >= '${d1}') 
        OR (SUBSTR(date, 6, 2) = '${m2}' AND SUBSTR(date, 9, 2) <= '${d2}')
    )
    GROUP BY date
)
GROUP BY SUBSTR(date, 1, 4)
`
:
`
SELECT 
    '${period}' AS period,
    a.year AS aYear, b.year as bYear, a.year || '-' || b.year AS year,
    a.days AS aDays, b.days as bDays, a.days + b.days AS days,
    a.period_sum AS aPeriod_sum, b.period_sum AS bPeriod_sum, a.period_sum + b.period_sum AS period_sum,
    ( a.period_sum + b.period_sum ) / ( a.days + b.days ) AS period_avg
FROM
(
	SELECT 
        SUBSTR(date,1,4) AS year, 
        count( date ) as days, 
        SUM( day_sum ) AS period_sum, 
        AVG( day_sum ) AS period_avg
    FROM 
	(
		SELECT 
            date, 
            SUM( quantity ) AS day_sum, 
            avg( quantity ) AS quantity 
		FROM savings 
		WHERE quantity > 0 AND SUBSTR(date,6,2) = '${m1}' AND SUBSTR(date,9,2) >= '${d1}'
		GROUP BY date
	)
	GROUP BY SUBSTR(date,1,4)
) a
JOIN
(
	SELECT 
        SUBSTR(date,1,4) AS year, 
        count( date ) as days, 
        SUM( day_sum ) AS period_sum, 
        AVG( day_sum ) AS period_avg
	FROM 
	(
		SELECT 
            date, 
            SUM( quantity ) AS day_sum, 
            avg( quantity ) AS quantity 
		FROM savings 
		WHERE quantity > 0 AND SUBSTR(date,6,2) = '${m2}' AND SUBSTR(date,9,2) <= '${d2}'
		GROUP BY date
	)
	GROUP BY SUBSTR(date,1,4)
) b
ON CAST(a.year AS INT) = CAST(b.year AS INT)-1
`
;

msg.topic = query;
msg.payload = query;
msg.joinKey = 'savings';

return msg;

name: production period30 query
func:
const { startPeriod30 } = global.get('dateHelpers');
const date2 = msg.payload;
const date1 = startPeriod30(date2);

const [y1, m1, d1] = date1.split('-');
const [y2, m2, d2] = date2.split('-');

const period = `${d1}/${m1}-${d2}/${m2}`;

const query = y1 === y2
    ?
    `
SELECT 
    '${period}' AS period, 
    SUBSTR(date, 1, 4) AS year,
    count(date) as days, 
    SUM(day_sum) AS period_sum, 
    AVG(day_sum) AS period_avg
FROM
(
    SELECT 
        date, 
        SUM(quantity) AS day_sum, 
        avg(quantity) AS quantity
    FROM production
    WHERE quantity > 0 
    AND 
    (
        (SUBSTR(date, 6, 2) = '${m1}' AND SUBSTR(date, 9, 2) >= '${d1}') 
        OR (SUBSTR(date, 6, 2) = '${m2}' AND SUBSTR(date, 9, 2) <= '${d2}')
    )
    GROUP BY date
)
GROUP BY SUBSTR(date, 1, 4)
`
    :
    `
SELECT 
    '${period}' AS period,
    a.year AS aYear, b.year as bYear, a.year || '-' || b.year AS year,
    a.days AS aDays, b.days as bDays, a.days + b.days AS days,
    a.period_sum AS aPeriod_sum, b.period_sum AS bPeriod_sum, a.period_sum + b.period_sum AS period_sum,
    ( a.period_sum + b.period_sum ) / ( a.days + b.days ) AS period_avg
FROM
(
	SELECT 
        SUBSTR(date,1,4) AS year, 
        count( date ) as days, 
        SUM( day_sum ) AS period_sum, 
        AVG( day_sum ) AS period_avg
    FROM 
	(
		SELECT 
            date, 
            SUM( quantity ) AS day_sum, 
            avg( quantity ) AS quantity 
		FROM production 
		WHERE quantity > 0 AND SUBSTR(date,6,2) = '${m1}' AND SUBSTR(date,9,2) >= '${d1}'
		GROUP BY date
	)
	GROUP BY SUBSTR(date,1,4)
) a
JOIN
(
	SELECT 
        SUBSTR(date,1,4) AS year, 
        count( date ) as days, 
        SUM( day_sum ) AS period_sum, 
        AVG( day_sum ) AS period_avg
	FROM 
	(
		SELECT 
            date, 
            SUM( quantity ) AS day_sum, 
            avg( quantity ) AS quantity 
		FROM production 
		WHERE quantity > 0 AND SUBSTR(date,6,2) = '${m2}' AND SUBSTR(date,9,2) <= '${d2}'
		GROUP BY date
	)
	GROUP BY SUBSTR(date,1,4)
) b
ON CAST(a.year AS INT) = CAST(b.year AS INT)-1
`
    ;

msg.topic = query;
msg.payload = query;
msg.joinKey = 'production';

return msg;

name: reservoirs period30 query
func:
/*
UPDATE reservoirs SET lat = 38.66, lon = 21.85 WHERE id == 1;
UPDATE reservoirs SET lat = 38.16, lon = 23.90 WHERE id == 2;
UPDATE reservoirs SET lat = 38.54, lon = 22.16 WHERE id == 3;
UPDATE reservoirs SET lat = 38.40, lon = 23.28 WHERE id == 4;
*/

const { startPeriod30 } = global.get('dateHelpers');
const date2 = msg.payload;
const date1 = startPeriod30(date2);

const [y1, m1, d1] = date1.split('-');
const [y2, m2, d2] = date2.split('-');

const period = `${d1}/${m1}-${d2}/${m2}`;

const query = y1 === y2
    ?
    `
SELECT 
    '${period}' AS period, 
    reservoir_id, 
    SUBSTR(date, 1, 4) AS year,
    count(date) as days, 
    SUM(day_sum) AS period_sum, 
    AVG(day_sum) AS period_avg
FROM
(
    SELECT 
        reservoir_id,
        date, 
        SUM(quantity) AS day_sum, 
        avg(quantity) AS quantity
    FROM savings
    WHERE quantity > 0 
    AND 
    (
        (SUBSTR(date, 6, 2) = '${m1}' AND SUBSTR(date, 9, 2) >= '${d1}') 
        OR (SUBSTR(date, 6, 2) = '${m2}' AND SUBSTR(date, 9, 2) <= '${d2}')
    )
    GROUP BY date, reservoir_id
)
GROUP BY SUBSTR(date, 1, 4), reservoir_id
`
    :
    `
SELECT 
    '${period}' AS period, a.reservoir_id AS reservoir_id,
    a.year AS aYear, b.year as bYear, a.year || '-' || b.year AS year,
    a.days AS aDays, b.days as bDays, a.days + b.days AS days,
    a.period_sum AS aPeriod_sum, b.period_sum AS bPeriod_sum, a.period_sum + b.period_sum AS period_sum,
    ( a.period_sum + b.period_sum ) / ( a.days + b.days ) AS period_avg
FROM
(
	SELECT 
        reservoir_id, 
        SUBSTR(date,1,4) AS year, 
        count( date ) as days, 
        SUM( day_sum ) AS period_sum, 
        AVG( day_sum ) AS period_avg
    FROM 
	(
		SELECT 
            reservoir_id, 
            date, 
            SUM( quantity ) AS day_sum, 
            avg( quantity ) AS quantity 
		FROM savings 
		WHERE quantity > 0 AND SUBSTR(date,6,2) = '${m1}' AND SUBSTR(date,9,2) >= '${d1}'
		GROUP BY date, reservoir_id
	)
	GROUP BY SUBSTR(date,1,4), reservoir_id
) a
JOIN
(
	SELECT 
        reservoir_id, 
        SUBSTR(date,1,4) AS year, 
        count( date ) as days, 
        SUM( day_sum ) AS period_sum, 
        AVG( day_sum ) AS period_avg
	FROM 
	(
		SELECT 
            reservoir_id, 
            date, 
            SUM( quantity ) AS day_sum, 
            avg( quantity ) AS quantity 
		FROM savings 
		WHERE quantity > 0 AND SUBSTR(date,6,2) = '${m2}' AND SUBSTR(date,9,2) <= '${d2}'
		GROUP BY date, reservoir_id
	)
	GROUP BY SUBSTR(date,1,4), reservoir_id
) b
ON CAST(a.year AS INT) = CAST(b.year AS INT)-1 AND a.reservoir_id = b.reservoir_id
`
    ;

msg.topic = query;
msg.payload = query;

return msg;

name: weather period30 query
func:
const { startPeriod30 } = global.get('dateHelpers');
const date2 = msg.payload;
const date1 = startPeriod30(date2);

const [y1, m1, d1] = date1.split('-');
const [y2, m2, d2] = date2.split('-');

const period = `${d1}/${m1}-${d2}/${m2}`;

const query = y1 === y2
    ?
    `
SELECT 
    '${period}' AS period,
    SUBSTR(date, 1, 4) AS year,
    SUM(precipitation_sum) AS precipitation_sum
FROM weather 
WHERE (SUBSTR(date, 6, 2) = '${m1}' AND SUBSTR(date, 9, 2) >= '${d1}') 
OR (SUBSTR(date, 6, 2) = '${m2}' AND SUBSTR(date, 9, 2) <= '${d2}')
GROUP BY SUBSTR(date, 1, 4)
`
    :
    `
SELECT
    '${period}' AS period,
    a.year AS aYear, b.year as bYear, a.year || '-' || b.year AS year,
    a.precipitation_sum + b.precipitation_sum AS precipitation_sum
FROM
(
    SELECT
        '${period}' AS period,
        SUBSTR(date, 1, 4) AS year,
        SUM(precipitation_sum) AS precipitation_sum
    FROM weather 
    WHERE SUBSTR(date, 6, 2) = '${m1}' AND SUBSTR(date, 9, 2) >= '${d1}'
    GROUP BY SUBSTR(date, 1, 4)
) a
JOIN
(
    SELECT
        '${period}' AS period,
        SUBSTR(date, 1, 4) AS year,
        SUM(precipitation_sum) AS precipitation_sum
    FROM weather 
    WHERE SUBSTR(date, 6, 2) = '${m2}' AND SUBSTR(date, 9, 2) <= '${d2}'
    GROUP BY SUBSTR(date, 1, 4)
) b
ON CAST(a.year AS INT) = CAST(b.year AS INT)-1
`
    ;

msg.topic = query;
msg.payload = query;
msg.joinKey = 'weather';

return msg;

about ca certificate
info:
SPECIFIC SETTINGS IN NODE-RED:
  in settings.js => process.env["NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED"] = 0
  in http-request => tick "Enable secure (SSL/TLS) connection" > create new TLS Config > upload CA certicicate > uncheck "Verify server certificate".
  based on: unable to verify the first certificate in Node-Red
  https://stackoverflow.com/questions/42983635/error-unable-to-verify-the-first-certificate-in-node-red/42984958#42984958

  GENERAL INFO USING NODEJS:
  fetch( "https://eydap.gr" );
  error: unable to verify the first certificate ('UNABLE_TO_VERIFY_LEAF_SIGNATURE')
  solution: process.env["NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED"] = 0;
  Warning: Setting the NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED environment variable to '0' makes TLS connections and HTTPS requests insecure by disabling certificate verification
  based on: Node Fetch Request Fails on Server: Unable to Get Local Issuer Certificate
  https://stackoverflow.com/questions/51995925/node-fetch-request-fails-on-server-unable-to-get-local-issuer-certificate

  curl -v https://www.eydap.gr
  error: unable to get local issuer certificate
  solution: chrome > https://eydap.gr > connection is secure > certificate is valid > details > export (crt file)
  (create a backup of /etc/ssl/certs/ca-certificates.crt)
  append crt file content in /etc/ssl/certs/ca-certificates.crt
